actionTemplate.title: Straight Brow
steps: Keep the brow body straight and minimize a strong arch
Draw near-parallel top and bottom lines and extend the tail
Blur the front; taper the tail with a fine tip
Brush to soften blocks and create a smooth gradient
Use concealer to sharpen a straighter lower edge if needed

rationaleTemplate: A softer arch reads youthful and gentle.
Straight structure can visually balance midface proportions.
